testcase.name: should always return same channel instance. It is not possible to have two different channels on same InputStream and OutputStream
should send text message to stream
binary messages should be encoded using base64 with "#" character as a prefix and new line in the end
should parse text message and pass it to consumer
should parse binary message and pass it to consumer
should send error to sender when binary message cannot be parsed
should convert exception thrown by consumer to error text message
when could not read from input stream then PeerNotReachable error should be reported
when could not write text to output stream then PeerNotReachable error should be reported
when could not write binary to output stream then PeerNotReachable error should be reported
should report error and close the channel when pushed binary message was big
should report error and close the channel when pushed text message was big
should report and close the channel when received binary message was too big
should report and close the channel when received text message was too big
should report and close the channel when received error message was too big
